div.p: To the Honorable the Chief Secretary

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p: I have the honor to submit for approval the following Estimate* of Expenditure during the Quarter ending June 30th 1877.

cell.p:
75
The nine entries on the first three rows have all been ticked, presumably at the Chief Secretary's Department.

Total — Three hundred and seventy seven pounds ten shillings and
-
pen

accounts
Ferd. von Mueller
